lines.text: What do you want to know so much about Miss Benton?
Er, is she one of those "celeberties"?
No. That is, she wasn't until a few hours ago.
[hands him the newspaper with the headline "Girl mysteriously slain in Apartment"]
Yes, Sir, she's a pretty lady.
What's the matter? Can't you read?
Er, I can read reading but I can't read writing!
